name: Motoverse
description: MOTOVERSE is a Web 3.0 lifestyle app with built-in Game-Fi & Social-Fi elements A new game concept of “Drive to Earn“ users get tokens reward through daily Mileage. Users start by purchasing NFTs that are tradable in the built-in game market. Through driving mileage users will get token (“MILE”) & game token (“MOTO”). Users can upgrade their NFT to earn more tokens. The token can be exchanged into USDT to get real profits, or can be used in real world for discount voucher at any merchants or places.
